name: Cyro - Ball and Chain
description:
Cyro - Ball and Chain by Nexdrol Games

You are a wizard with a magic connection to a Blizzard Ball. The Ball works like a pendulum with you as the anchor. 

Swing the Ball around and swap places with it to use the momentum to clear gaps and reach higher platforms. 

Torches melt the magic chain links and kill you and the Ball.

Controls:

A and D: Horizontal Movement

W: Jump

Space: Swap places with the Blizzard Ball

J and K: Decrease/Increase Chain length

R: Reset the Level

Enter: Skip the Level
